item.title: How to Use Display Settings Plus
item.description: 0: Preface This software only works if you are utilizing the X11 display manager. This blog post explains how to become well-rounded in the software but most Linux users will be able to use it out of the box and hover over any button to get a quick description to slowly come to understand how it works. Otherwise, comparisons against alternative programs such as ARandR and source code can be found on the GitHub page.
